adjectives.description: papern (comparative more papern, superlative most papern)

entries.meaning: (rare or chiefly dialectal) Made of paper
examples: A woodhouse is rightly a house for wood, and a woodenhouse one made of wood; a paper bag, a bag for papers, and a papern bag, one made of paper; an iron tool, one for working in iron, and an ironen tool, one of iron, and so on.
